parameters.query: SELECT o.*, m.name as monteur_name FROM orders o LEFT JOIN monteurs m ON o.assigned_monteur = m.telegram_id WHERE DATE(o.preferred_time) = '{{$json.date}}' OR (o.status = 'offen' AND DATE(o.created_at) = '{{$json.date}}') ORDER BY o.preferred_time ASC, o.created_at ASC
SELECT telegram_id FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'vergabe') AND active = 1
